log_level.description: The severity level of the alert (info, warning, error)

resource_sid.description: The SID of the specific resource associated with the alert

date_updated.description: The date and time when the alert was last updated

account_sid.description: The unique identifier for the account associated with the alert

url.description: The URL or endpoint related to the alert

request_method.description: The method used in the HTTP request that triggered the alert

date_generated.description: The date and time when the alert data was generated

alert_text.description: The actual content or text of the alert message

sid.description: The unique identifier (SID) for the alert entry

date_created.description: The date and time when the alert was created

request_url.description: The URL that was requested and triggered the alert

service_sid.description: The SID of the Twilio service related to the alert

error_code.description: The code representing the error, if an error occurred

api_version.description: The version of the Twilio API used for the alert

more_info.description: Additional information or details related to the alert
